###\ Enum 枚举
每个枚举用小写字母开始

```swift
enum Shape {
  case rectangle
  case square
  case rightTriangle
  case equilateralTriangle
}
```

## Selectors方法选择器
### 推荐
```objc
let sel = #selector(viewDidLoad)
```
### 不推荐
```objc
let sel = #selector(ViewController.viewDidLoad)
```
